main event: Mr. John Smith observed a bright light in the sky moving in a northeasterly direction at his residence in Little Rock, Arkansas.
interesting points: The object was reported moving at an altitude of 500 feet and an estimated speed of 500 miles per hour,The object was circular in shape and emitted a bright, white light,Mr. Smith noted that the object made no sound,The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds,The case will be forwarded to Project Blue Book for further investigation.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: Mr. John Smith, a resident of Little Rock
